Package com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client

Core package

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IView The view is the graphical part of the application get datas from model use controler to action on the system.
Maskable Allow to mask an element.
ModelForView<T> ModelForView allows view to call getValue and only getValue
 

Class Summary
BrowserEvent Event send by the browser to signal a new URL or historyToken
Controller The controller acts as a coordinator.
Event<T,V extends Enum> Represents an event on the gui USAGE: create an event to notify a user gesture to the controller
Masker Allow to externally mask an element.
Model<T> Represent a data on the system.
MvcEntryPoint implements GWT entry point USAGE : configure your module with a concrete class extending this one
View The view is the graphical part of the application get datas from model use controler to action on the system USAGE: The view could be implemented by a component or a group of components The contructor must be call by the controller of the view.
 

Enum Summary
Event.BROWSER_ACTION Specify an action which comes from the browser
